Comment: “*Any performer who isn’t professional enough to perform for patrons of all backgrounds, regardless of political affiliation, won’t be welcomed. In fact, we think it would be important to out those vapid and intolerant artists to ensure producers know who they shouldn’t hire – and that the public knows which shows have political litmus tests to sit in the audience. The Kennedy Center wants to be a place where people of all political stripes sit next to each other and never ask who someone voted for but instead enjoys a performance together.*”     On the contrary, Mr. Grennell, now we know which cast members and performers to support and hire.  Go fuck yourself and the sanctimony you rode in on; artists are not your slaves!
